price: Mmom Lut abusuafoͻ no deε yεbεgye wͻn nyinaa nkwa;
arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajmaʿīna
